name: Mathias Rolland
bio: My name is Mathias Rolland, I’m 29 and I’ve been a developer for close to seven years, and working in the industry as a gameplay programmer for Ubisoft for a bit more than four. I’ve worked mostly on AI and gameplay elements, notably on the main DLCs for the two previous Assassin’s Creed games, and was in the team responsible of the Teammates AI on Ghost Recon Wildlands.
